thread.title: Selena Gomez shrugs off Grammy Awards to sing karaoke
thread.title_full: Selena Gomez shrugs off Grammy Awards to sing karaoke | Daily Mail Online

author: Heidi Parker For Dailymail.com
title: Selena Gomez shrugs off Grammy Awards to sing karaoke
text:
Selena Gomez was not nominated for a Grammy on Sunday night even though she had three mega hits in 2016: Same Old Love, Hands To Myself and Good For You.
So it's no wonder the Revival hitmaker shrugged off the biggest night in music to do her own thing.
The 24-year-old beauty was seen enjoying a night of karaoke with beau The Weeknd at Rihanna's party thrown at 1OAK in LA.
Her own thing: Selena Gomez shrugged off the Grammys on Sunday and instead sang karaoke with beau The Weeknd at Rihanna's party thrown at 1OAK in LA
With her man? The former Disney star wore a denim jacket that could have belonged to her beau The Weeknd
The former Disney star wore a denim jacket that could have belonged to The Weeknd. The cover girl had her hair piled up and she had on heavy eye makeup.
The Wizards Of Waverly Place star has been busy promoting her new TV series 13 Reasons Why.
Her ex Justin Bieber was nominated for his single Love Yourself, but he did not attend the event and didn't win either. Instead he shared that he was having sushi in LA.
All good: The star was seen laughing as a blonde was on stage
He said no to the Grammys: Her ex Justin Bieber was nominated for his single Love Yourself, but he did not attend the event and didn't win either. Instead he shared that he was having sushi in LA
The Weeknd was not nominated for a Grammy because his album Starboy came out after the cutoff.
This sighting comes after Selena shared an Instagram post on Saturday where she was strolling toward the camera in baggy, faded overalls.
A strap was missing on the right side, which meant the denim flap at the front sagged forward, baring part of her enviably flat midriff.
She refreshed herself by way of a cup of coffee that obscured most of her face, and she shoved her free hand into her pocket.
Missing strap: Gomez went for a country motif in her Instagram post on Saturday, strolling toward the camera in baggy, faded overalls
The 24-year-old had paired the overalls with a white crop top and headed down the garden path of a blue suburban house. 'Morning walks,' she captioned.
Earlier this week, she uploaded an Instagram photo of herself with cast members of 13 Reasons Why, a 13-episode show on which she's an executive producer.
Based on the 2007 young adult book Thirteen Reasons Why by Jay Asher, the Netflix show will premiere on the website come March 31.
'An authentic story': Earlier this week, she uploaded an Instagram photo of herself with cast members of 13 Reasons Why (from left) Tommy Dorfman, Christian Navarro, Gomez, Dylan minnette and Katherine Langford
Katherine Langford will appear as Hannah, a high school student who commits suicide at the beginning of the novel. Dylan Minnette plays her besotted classmate Clay, who two weeks after her death comes upon tapes she'd made explaining to him why she'd killed herself.
In the Instagram photo, Gomez posed at a bar table with not only Langford and Minnette, but also their castmates Christian Navarro and Tommy Dorfman.
'What 13 reasons why has represented was an authentic story of what every kid deals with in every day life. The pressure, the unrealistic expectations of what they believe they should be,' she wrote in her caption.
Out and about: The Come And Get It singer paired her pale orange sweater dress with a red button-down shirt, an outfit she'd been seen in Wednesday night while emerging from an amfAR event in New York City
Knock their socks off in a knitted midi dress by Victoria Beckham Victoria Beckham Pre-Fall 2017
Shop the current collection at Net-a-Porter
Buy now
Victoria Beckham always looks amazing in her own dresses, but Selena Gomez gave the designer a run for her money when she was spotted wearing this Pre-Fall 2017 piece in New York!
We love the mustard shade and layered shirt effect of this dress, which Selena styled with a pair of leopard print sandals. The handkerchief hem is super flattering, plus a rib knit dress is perfect for this time of year.
Style it with knee high boots and a tailored coat, or with barely there heels and a biker jacket for evening. What's not to love?
Unfortunately this exact style isn't yet available to buy, but click (right) to shop the current VB collection at Net-a-Porter.
Alternatively, Lavish Alice, Vila, Forever 21 and Self-Portrait have all got great options to help you master the midi dress trend. Check them out in our edit below.

'Whether you have read this book or not, it's a story of what every kid does and will continue to go through - unless we keep talking about it. People are hurting and deserve to be heard.'
She closed: 'Tired of others portraying a false idea of what every day life is. I hope @13reasonswhy can enlighten people to what words mean when you say them.'
The Come And Get It singer paired her pale orange sweater dress with a red button-down shirt, an outfit she'd been seen in Wednesday night while emerging from an amfAR event in New York City.
In the offing: Based on the 2007 young adult book Thirteen Reasons Why by Jay Asher, the Netflix show will premiere on the website come March 31
